page.title: 20 FARMS
page.content: Farms in the 12 squares of the survey. 1.Bod-derwen , Cae-march 2.Bryn Offa , Erw-las , Llwyn Offa , Mynydd-bychan 3.Plas Ifan , Alltami , Cottage , Little Wood 4.Oak ,Pinfold Lane 5.Rhyd-y-galed , Rhyd Alun 6.Argoed Hall , Bryn-derw , Bryn , Bryn-y-ffynnon , Argoed 7.Bryn-y-baal isa , Bryn-y-baal ucha , Aberllannerch , Prenbrigog , Myrtle 8.Mountain , Field 9.Pen-y-bont 10.Bron-wylfa , Tyddyn , Hill 11.Bistre Cottage , Bryn-y-pys , Bod Offa , Glenbrook , Plas Major , Whitehouse 12.Brook , Bryn-feigas , Oak Tree
